name: GetCrossAppAccessConnections
description:
Retrieve Cross App Access connections for a specified app.

Use this tool to obtain information about inbound and outbound Cross App Access connections linked to a specific application. It provides the necessary details about the connections associated with the app.

parameters.name: application_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the application for which Cross App Access connections are retrieved.

parameters.name: pagination_cursor
parameters.description: Specifies the pagination cursor for retrieving the next page of connection results.

value_schema.description: Specifies the pagination cursor for the next page of connection results

parameters.name: results_per_page
parameters.description: Number of results per page: -1 for all results, 0 for empty, or a positive integer for specific count.

value_schema.description:
Specifies the number of results to return per page. The values:
  * -1: Return all results (up to system maximum)
  * 0: Return an empty result set
  * Positive integer: Return up to that many results (capped at system maximum)

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the okta API.

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: Specifies the pagination cursor for the next page of connection results

value_schema.description: Specifies the pagination cursor for the next page of connection results

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description:
Specifies the number of results to return per page. The values:
  * -1: Return all results (up to system maximum)
  * 0: Return an empty result set
  * Positive integer: Return up to that many results (capped at system maximum)

value_schema.description:
Specifies the number of results to return per page. The values:
  * -1: Return all results (up to system maximum)
  * 0: Return an empty result set
  * Positive integer: Return up to that many results (capped at system maximum)

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
